name: Cinemabition (22T1)
description:
Cinemabition is a playable exhibition featuring many of the projects created by Games students during Trimester 1 2022 at SAE's Brisbane Campus.

Featured Projects

  • Studio 1 - Paper Planes
  • Studio 1 - Wrath of Cod
  • Studio 2 - Meow Meow
  • Studio 2 - Death Jump
  • Studio 2 - Ship It!
  • Studio 3 - Do I Have Everything?
  • Studio 3 - A Night At Home
  • Studio 3 - Creature Feature
  • Studio 3 - Stay
  • Studio 3 - Strike A Pose
  • Studio 3 - Arena of the Gods
  • Studio 4 - Impromptu Space Program
  • Studio 4 - A.R.E.S VR
  • Studio 4 - Hot Stuff
  • CIU212 - Chook'n & The Space Time Egg Splosion (Prototype)
  • CIU212 - Arcadia (Prototype)
  • CIU212 - [UNTITLED STORY GAME] (Prototype)
  • CIU330 - Mr.Puppy Pet
  • CIU330 - Mr.Puppy Run - Treasure Hunt
  • CIU330 - Stellar Winds

Cinemabition Team (21T1)

  • Noran Linggod
  • Baylee Windebank

  • Jakob Houghton
